button_start_battle.comment: Prioritylock: Added specatator host check due to host as spectator, always ready but dont want to lock the whole screen with priority lock as need to be able to change settings

localised_text.tooltip_text: Swap the attacker and defender around in the battle.

Opens up the logs/terrain.html file so you can see more details about the current selected map. Updated once the radar preview is finished updating (you can just refresh the browser when the the radar generation stops to see details of newly selected map)

Opens up the logs/terrain.html file so you can see more details about the current selected map. Updated once the radar preview is finished updating (you can just refresh the browser when the the radar generation stops to see details of newly selected map)
Saves the image of the radar to appdata logs folder with name radar_preview
Enable this to make armies (apart from the first in each alliance) be treated as reinforcements (handy for testing reinforcement functionality).
Change the tower level||The attacking team is given the displayed funds based on the selected tower level.
Click to zoom to province capital.
This settlement is controlled by another faction.

label_context_name.comment: Fill in context object and function to match objects dealing with so can display object. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

callback_with_context.context_function_id: DoIfElse(RootComponent.Dimensions.x > 1900, self.Resize(1220, self.Dimensions.y, false), self.Resize(935, self.Dimensions.y, false))

list_box.comment: Stores player slot so children that might not exist at right time can grab it

recruitment_parent.comment: Parent for recruitables, stores player slot context so can be queried by recruitment items

autoresolve_display.componentleveltooltip: The green bar represents the power of the team on the left and the red bar represents the power of the team on the right. \n If one bar is larger than the other, it means the army with the larger bar has an advantage over the smaller one

unit_selection_handler.comment: This component is the selection parent to handle selection of the current unit(s) for upgrading xp, etc. It lives at this top level so can have a single unit selection selected across both teams!

popup_waiting.comment: Shown when joining a multiplayer battle before it is ready. Has animations that does opposite you would expect (show hides) in order to invert functionality

ready_parent.comment: Shown once screen ready, which is immediately in sp but there is a delay in joining game where dont want to show placeholder info which is why we hide it until then

label_large_armies.componentleveltooltip: Regular armies are limited to a maximum of 20 units, whereas large armies have are limited to a maximum of 40 units.||This option is unavailable when more than 4 armies are involved in the battle.

label_realism_mode.componentleveltooltip: When checked, battles must be fought without the radar map or contextual tooltips. Orders may not be issued whilst the battle is paused and the game speed may not be slowed.||The camera will be restricted to within 200 meters of any unit, and any enemy units more than 600 meters away will be hidden from sight.

player_selection_handler.comment: This component is the selection parent to handle selection of the current player slot for showing units, etc. It lives at this top level so can have a single player selection selected across both teams!

recruitable_list_parent.comment: This resizes to fit rest of space available in parent, so if want to tweak where bottom of this is tweak height of parent!

label_map_name.comment: Fill in context object and function to match objects dealing with so can display object. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

label_cost.comment: Fill in context object and function to match objects dealing with so can display object. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

header.componentleveltooltip: Each spell purchased will reduce the cost of further spells

unit_upgrade_list_popup.comment: We use a blank context visibility setter to hide initially in game, and mouseclickhidecallback to make hide when click elsewhere

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(GetTotalBudget(true, true) == GetTotalBudget(false, true), Format(Loc("total_funds_available"), GetTotalBudget(true, true)), Format(Loc("total_funds_available_for"), Loc("attacker"), GetTotalBudget(false, true)) + " " + Format(Loc("total_funds_available_for"), Loc("defender"), GetTotalBudget(true, true))) + GetIf(GetReinforcementFundsMultiplier != 1.0, Format(" %s (%f)", Loc("reinforcement_fund_multiplier"), GetReinforcementFundsMultiplier)) #GetTotalBudget(is_defender, is_main_army)

label_cost.comment: Fill in context object and function to match objects dealing with so can display object. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

team_spacer.comment: This shows when label_parent hidden (when not attacker/defender like mp land battle), but not free for all so we still have a visible gap between the teams

empty_general_slot.comment: Shown when no general to ensure normal unit doesnt take this slot

visibility_parent.comment: Sets visibility based on if actually have any upgrades. Need separate compoennt as visibility handled by MouseClickHideCallback for actual panel and toggler so would conflict having this on parent component

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse( GetTotalBudget(true, true) == GetTotalBudget(false, true), Format(Loc("total_funds_available"), GetTotalBudget(true, true)), Format(Loc("total_funds_available_for"), Loc("attacker"), GetTotalBudget(false, true)) + " " + Format(Loc("total_funds_available_for"), Loc("defender"), GetTotalBudget(true, true))) #GetTotalBudget(is_defender, is_main_army)

label_storm_of_magic.componentleveltooltip: The battles takes place within a Storm of Magic. The winds of magic are infinite in these battles and casting spells will change the ascendant wind, each with a global effect and a different cataclysm spell.

autoresolve_visibility_parent.comment: This is parent that gets visibility toggled by dev ui button, so separate to dev ui parent whose visibility determined by if dev ui enabled or not

button_add_spectator.comment: Adds multiplayer player slot for someone to join game in MP only

invite_holder.comment: This shows when label_parent hidden (when not attacker/defender like mp land battle), but not free for all so we still have a visible gap between the teams

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(GetTotalBudget(true, false) == GetTotalBudget(false, false), Format(Loc("total_funds_available"), GetTotalBudget(true, false)), Format(Loc("total_funds_available_for"), Loc("attacker"), GetTotalBudget(false, false)) + " " + Format(Loc("total_funds_available_for"), Loc("defender"), GetTotalBudget(true, false)))+ GetIf(GetReinforcementFundsMultiplier != 1.0, Format(" %s (%f)", Loc("reinforcement_fund_multiplier"), GetReinforcementFundsMultiplier)) #GetTotalBudget(is_defender, is_main_army)

label_unit_caps.componentleveltooltip: Toggle multiplayer unit caps. The unit cap limits the total number of units associated with a single unit type in an army. Some units contribute towards several unit caps. If capacity is reached for any of the associated unit caps, the unit cannot be recruited.||Unit caps are always applied to ranked battles.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (Empty = SelectedObjectList.IsEmpty, OnlyOne = SelectedObjectList.Size == 1, FirstOne = SelectedObjectList.FirstContext) => { Empty == false && ((OnlyOne && (FirstOne.AvailableMountsList.Size > 0 || FirstOne.AvailableUpgradeList.Size > 0 || FirstOne.UnitTypes.Size > 0)) || SelectedObjectList.All(UnmountedRecordContext == this.SelectedObjectList.FirstContext.UnmountedRecordContext && AvailableUpgradeList.Size == 0 && UnitTypes.Size > 0)) }

GetIfElse(GetTotalBudget(true, false) == GetTotalBudget(false, false), Format(Loc("total_funds_available"), GetTotalBudget(true, false)), Format(Loc("total_funds_available_for"), Loc("attacker"), GetTotalBudget(false, false)) + " " + Format(Loc("total_funds_available_for"), Loc("defender"), GetTotalBudget(true, false)))+ GetIf(GetReinforcementFundsMultiplier != 1.0, Format(" %s (%f)", Loc("reinforcement_fund_multiplier"), GetReinforcementFundsMultiplier)) #GetTotalBudget(is_defender, is_main_army)

header.componentleveltooltip: Each spell purchased will reduce the cost of further spells

icon_autogen_available.comment: Used for dev functionality where can disable units from being included in autogen

recruitment_options_list.comment: Stores player slot so children that might not exist at right time can grab it

callback_with_context.context_function_id: DoIfElse(RootComponent.Dimensions.x > 1900, self.Resize(595, self.Dimensions.y, false), self.Resize(460, self.Dimensions.y, false))

template_unit_group.comment: We propagate our own group context on receiving a player to ensure update4s when selection changes, but have to get player context from parent as we might not exist when initially passed down!

unit_card.comment: ScottB: The ContextPropagator that passes own context to self for unit record is to make it refresh when change selection, in the event that the list itself isnt refreshed when changed character selection

unit_list.comment: We propagate our own group context on receiving a player to ensure update4s when selection changes, but have to get player context from parent as we might not exist when initially passed down!

callback_with_context.context_function_id: GetIfElse(GetTotalBudget(true, true) == GetTotalBudget(false, true), Format(Loc("total_funds_available"), GetTotalBudget(true, true)), Format(Loc("total_funds_available_for"), Loc("attacker"), GetTotalBudget(true, true)) + " " + Format(Loc("total_funds_available_for"), Loc("defender"), GetTotalBudget(true, false)))+ GetIf(GetReinforcementFundsMultiplier != 1.0, Format(" %s (%f)", Loc("reinforcement_fund_multiplier"), GetReinforcementFundsMultiplier)) #GetTotalBudget(is_defender, is_main_army)

label_tx.componentleveltooltip: Search for a unit by its name or name of one of its traits/abilities

text_input_search.componentleveltooltip: Search for a unit by its name or name of one of its traits/abilities

callback_with_context.context_function_id: UiMsg(Format("DevUnitSearchChanged%S", "")) # this %S is here is because it asserts otherwise.. soorryy!
